page.title: 08Shopping facilities
page.content: The only shop in our "D.Block" is the small Post Office at Weston Underwood which sells stamps, stationery and pet foods. Shopping can pose a problem, as there is no mobile shop. For people ewho do not find it easy to leave either village, groceries can be ordered from Smiths of Ashbourne, who deliver by van. Fish is delivered on Wednesday, meat on Thursday or Friday, green-grocery on Friday. David the milkman brings a selection of dairy foods during the week. A survey shows that most people travel by car to Park Farm, Allestree, and shop there at the purpose-built shopping centre and International supermarket.
